content: nothing says cozy winter chic like a beautiful hand knit buffalo plaid cold weather accessory this gorgeous hat is so much fun to knit too - you will love seeing the design come to life as you finish each round and if you are new to stranded colour work worry not the pattern includes a video tutorial on how to change colours when knitting up the hat all you need to do is pick your favourite colour combination of yarn and start knitting your very own buffalo plaid winter hat today this pattern is an instant download pdf file for a stylish and warm buffalo plaid knit winter hat/toque the pattern is posted for free on my blog www leeleeknits com video tutorial included you may also purchase the pdf file for easy printing and reading
